lead_paragraph: Bill Cosby made his first public statement since being charged with aggravated indecent assault, posting a message to Twitter saying, “Friends and fans, Thank You.”
snippet: Bill Cosby made his first public statement since being charged with aggravated indecent assault, posting a message to Twitter saying, “Friends and fans, Thank You.”

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Cosby Thanks Fans in Message on Twitter
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Cosby Thanks Fans in Message on Twitter

abstract: Bill Cosby posts message on Twitter thanking his friends and fans, first public statement since being charged with aggravated indecent assault due to accusation made by Andrea Constand that Cosby drugged and sexually abused her in 2004.
